alert.note: Alert for Geary; Lyon; Morris (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Geary, northeastern Morris, southeastern Shawnee, southern Wabaunsee, Osage and northern Lyon Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong outflow winds along a gust front extending from 3 miles southwest of Berryton to near Harveyville to 7 miles east of Volland to 10 miles south of Manhattan. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Topeka, Osage City, Carbondale, Eskridge, Overbrook, Lyndon, Burlingame, Scranton, Alta Vista, Harveyville, Allen, Admire, Pomona Lake, Berryton and Volland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 near mile marker 313. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 145 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
